content.rendered:
Maximum progress

At Cimesa, a Soletanche Bachy subsidiary in Mexico, Alfredo works for his entity and for Menard Mexico. Following soil improvement training in France, he returned to Mexico to continue to make progress in his field of activity.

excerpt.rendered: At Cimesa, a Soletanche Bachy subsidiary in Mexico, Alfredo works for his entity and for Menard Mexico.
